title: Blight Crystal Lissandra Skin Idea
body:
Drew this yesterday night.
http://th07.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/i/2014/286/b/9/league_of_legends___blight_crystal_lissandra_skin_by_lolmitsu-d82ktoj.jpg

I'm a big Lissandra fan and would give anything for this skin.
I loved the Blight Crystal Varus concept, and saw other BC related fan art as well (Taric for example), so I decided to make one for Liss as it would fit her perfectly.
Personally, I'm not a big fan of any of her skins because either her colors are weak (especially Blade Queen with her dull green), and
I would love a skin where her particles are just in a bright, strong color.

DA link for anyone who's interested.
http://lolmitsu.deviantart.com/#/art/League-of-Legends-Blight-Crystal-Lissandra-Skin-488060227?hf=1

replies.body: O___O I really like this idea!

As much as I like the concept, I'd kill for a skin in which we can actually see her face decently, preferably one that showed us how she was BEFORE her new form, like Exiled Morgana, for example. If Riot ever releases that, I'll gladly buy Liss and main her.
Cool artwork! Blight Crystal Skarner next pls!

> Cool artwork! Blight Crystal Skarner next pls!

It was my first time I actually messed with colors seriously.
But yea, if no one will draw Blight Crystal Skarner, I will :p
